explains: n. 被提名者，被任命者；（投资等的）名义持有人，注册人；代名人，代名组织

sentences.en: His nominee for vice president was elected only after a second ballot.
sentences.cn: 他的副总统候选人仅在第二轮投票后就被选中。

sentences.en: The presidential nominee was advised to choose a woman as a running mate.
sentences.cn: 有人建议总统候选人找一位女性竞选伙伴。

sentences.en: Raeder was also at pains to see that each nominee was of strong moral fibre.
sentences.cn: 雷德也迫切想看到每一位候选人都具有坚定的道德品行。
